text: This is a detailed list of transactions during the 2002-03 NBA season. ==Events== If you want to see the transaction events (from July 17, 2002 to June 27, 2003), see the links below ==References== == External links == * 2002-03 NBA Transactions| Basketball-Reference.com Transactions 2002-03
title: List of 2002–03 NBA season transactions
